item.title: Use git-crypt to Encrypt Files in Git
item.author: guosuiyu@gmail.com (mcsrainbow)
item.description: git-crypt is a tool for encrypting and decrypting files that integrates seamlessly with Git repositories, allowing users to securely store and share sensitive data.
